text: Myrtopsis is a genus of shrubs in the family Rutaceae. The genus is endemic to New Caledonia in the Pacific and contains c. 8 species. == List of species == * Myrtopsis calophylla * Myrtopsis corymbosa * Myrtopsis deplanchei * Myrtopsis macrocarpa * Myrtopsis myrtoidea * Myrtopsis novaecaledoniae * Myrtopsis pomaderridifolia * Myrtopsis sellingii ==References== Category:Endemic flora of New Caledonia Category:Rutaceae genera
title: Myrtopsis
